uk.fictitiousurl.audiorelay

Class AudioRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.fictitiousurl.audiorelay.AudioRecord

  • public class AudioRecord
extends Object
    Class to store audio "records" or "chunks", meaning a short audio recording read from a file, or transmitted using UDP.
    Author:
    Oliver Smart <osmart01@dcs.bbk.ac.uk>

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private AudioFormat audioFormat
      A chunk is defined by an AudioFormat together with a byte array.
      private byte[] bytes
      A chunk is defined by an AudioFormat together with a byte array.

      construct AudioRecord object from a file
